content: the knit gusset border stitches 96 102 108 stitches total stopping at the end of the round indicated on the chart final round of gusset is an increase round do not work the corresponding closing yos round heel turn the heel turn is worked using german short row see tutorials link and is the same for all sizes the gusset border stitches should be on the instep needle and are not used in the heel turn 30 32 34 stitches are used for the heel turn row 1 turn work and make ds purl to end of sole row 2 turn work and make ds knit to the previous ds row 3 turn work and make ds purl to the previous ds row 4 - 15 continue working back and forth until there are 8 ds on one side and 7 on the other the last short row worked is a purl row turn work and make ds knit across sole to the first ds knit the ds through both legs and continue to bor work gussets and instep as presented remembering to close the yarn overs as before knit across sole working the remaining ds through both legs as before stop at bor this is just before the gusset border stitch conjoined sock twins v6 0 ©2025 katherine richmond rinaradish 5 of 12 if desired move all the increased gusset stitches to the sole stitch needles or just the gusset border stitch the heel flap will be worked back and forth working the last stitch of the heel with the next gusset stitch on each side the gusset border stitch on the heel side the one that was kept as a knit all along will become the slipped edge stitch on each side heel flap remove bor marker and set aside for now it will be replaced after the heel flap is done all slipped stitches are slipped purl-wise with the yarn held to the wrong side of the sock ssk this is the gusset border stitch plus the first purl of the gusset turn work size 64 heel flap set up slip first stitch k2 p2 x7 k2 p2tog these are the gusset border stitch and the first increased stitch of the gusset on the other side turn size 68 heel flap set up slip first stitch p1 k2 p2 x7 k2 p1 p2tog these are the gusset border stitch and the first increased stitch of the gusset on the other side turn size 72 heel flap set up slip first stitch k1 p1 k2 p2 x7 k2 p1 k1 p2tog these are the gusset border stitch and the first increased stitch of the gusset on the other side turn all sizes right side heel row rs slip first stitch work the ribbing as it appears until one stitch before the gap between heel and gusset ssk last heel stitch aka gusset border stitch with next gusset stitch turn all sizes wrong side heel row ws slip first
